name: CL_PLF
description: This table extracts information from the PLF master file. PLF records represent the different areas that a patient can be in when using the Patient Location application. They can represent well known areas such as rooms and bed, or any location that the user wants to define. PLF records are also used for direction mapping in the Welcome kiosk.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the PLF record.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: A patient/customer-friendly display name for the patient location. For example, this name will be displayed to patients using the Welcome kiosk.
